channel.title: Fast Sync with Cypress on Klaytn CCO Onboarding - Cypress
channel.description: Recent content in Fast Sync with Cypress on Klaytn CCO Onboarding - Cypress

item.title: Download the latest Cypress chaindata
item.description: 1. Download the latest chaindata snapshot from the Cypress snapshot archive. 0) Before proceeding, please check if your disk space is enough to store and extract the Cypress chaindata. ** You can refer to the chaindata size via Cypress snapshot archive where the Cypress chaindata snapshots have been snapshotted. 1) For CN and PN1 ** Please note that this step will take a lot of time to download since snapshot is more than 1.

item.title: Extract the chaindata
item.description: 2. Extract the chaindata downloaded to the DATA_DIR. 1) For CN, $ tar -C <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data -xvf klaytn-cypress-chaindata-20240131010151.tar.gz --exclude klay/chaindata/receipts 2) For PN1, $ tar -C <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data -xvf klaytn-cypress-chaindata-20240131010151.tar.gz --exclude klay/chaindata/receipts 3) For PN2, $ tar -C <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data -xvf klaytn-cypress-pruning-chaindata-20240131010111.tar.gz --exclude klay/chaindata/receipts If you finish this step, please click the next button > on the right side of this page.
